oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flags; De La Salle Christian Brothers; Quadrangles (Courtyards); Festivals
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The French origins of the De La Salle Christian Brothers made Memphis in May's 1990 tribute to France of particular interest.
A flag reading "Christian Brothers University ... Avec les Freres" flew over Buckman Quadrangle for a Paris Street Fete. The flag partially obscures the replica Eiffel Tower built by Engineering students. Mimes and jugglers entertained the attendees.
